document.full_text: nbc said thursday that vivian schiller, who resigned from npr in march in the midst of controversy, would lead an expansion of the nbc news division's ventures in digital media.
document.title: schiller named as nbc digital officer
lines_and_colors: nbc said thursday that vivian schiller, who resigned from npr in march in the midst of controversy, would lead an expansion of the nbc news division's ventures in digital media.
